definition: unstoppable/hard to hold back
acute
(negative prefix)/not/no
see 可汗[ke4 han2]
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
(onom.) dong/ding dong (bell)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: The team seems unstoppable in their drive for the championship.
sentences.chinese: 这支球队争取冠军的气势似锐不可当。

sentences.english: Early in 2009, the dollar appeared unstoppable.
sentences.chinese: 美元在2009年初期锐不可当。

sentences.english: That formidable remnant had been annihilated; the Guard was dead.
sentences.chinese: 那点锐不可当的残余也被歼灭了，羽林军覆没了。

sentences.english: The army in front of me looks invincible.
sentences.chinese: 我眼前的这支军队锐不可当。

sentences.english: His own career continues its inexorable ascent.
sentences.chinese: 他事业的上升势头锐不可当。

sentences.english: He's a lean, mean, fighting machine.
sentences.chinese: 他是一架锐不可当的战斗机器。

sentences.english: And on his return in the last few games, he was already looking very sharp.
sentences.chinese: 而且从他最后回归的几场比赛来看，他锐不可当。

sentences.english: This team is unstoppable – they won the championship with one bash at it.
sentences.chinese: 这个球队锐不可当，一举拿下冠军。

definition: impossible to resist (idiom); an irresistible force
see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]
to sweep everything before one/to be invincible (idiom)
like a hot knife through butter (idiom)/with irresistible force
to be swept by the wind/to be blown about by the wind/to be routed (in battle etc)
lit. a force to smash bamboo (idiom); fig. irresistible force
to be invincible/unrivalled
to triumph in every battle (idiom); invincible/to succeed in every undertaking
to advance courageously (idiom)/to press forward
spirit reaches to the rainbow/full of noble aspiration and daring
unsurpassed/unparalleled
no stronghold one cannot overcome (idiom); to conquer every obstacle/nothing one can't do/to carry everything before one
to advance boldly/to push ahead vigorously
total annihilation
to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering/ever victorious/nothing they can't do
pinyin: gong1 wu2 bu4 ke4 , zhan4 wu2 bu4 sheng4

definition: lit. to topple the mountains and overturn the seas (idiom); earth-shattering/fig. gigantic/of spectacular significance
